alert.note: Alert for Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Southern Hudspeth Highlands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 6:41AM CST until February 02 at 6:00AM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Icy conditions expected. Total freezing rain accumulations less than 0.1 inch. * WHERE...Southern Hudspeth Highlands and Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM Wednesday to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and icy road conditions. Bridges will ice before roadways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Southern Hudspeth Highlands
